snippet: “Muppets Most Wanted” introduces a new character: Constantine, a Russian villain described as the “world’s No. 1 criminal” who also looks nearly identical to Kermit.”
abstract: Muppets Most Wanted introduces new character of Constantine, Russian villain described as the 'world’s No 1 criminal' who also looks nearly identical to Kermit the Frog; filmmaker, James Bobin and puppeteers discuss fundamental differences and similarities that went into making of evil doppelganger.
lead_paragraph: “Muppets Most Wanted” introduces a new character: Constantine, a Russian villain described as the “world’s No. 1 criminal” who also looks nearly identical to Kermit.”

headline.seo: For ‘Muppets Most Wanted,’ Kermit’s Evil Twin
headline.main: One of These Frogs Is Extremely Dangerous
headline.print_headline: One of These Frogs Is Extremely Dangerous
